name: Zoro Inu
description: Zoro Inu is a community controlled deflationary token, Zoro Inu's purpose is to develop solutions that will make the cryptocurrency space safer and easier to understand for everyone. The deflationary mechanism of the Zoro Inu token includes a redistribution system. 5% of each transaction is distributed as a reward to holders. On top of this, 50% of the total $ZORO supply will be burned, liquidity will be locked we will employ the use of Anti-whale Encrypted Contracts.
